text: This is a list of colleges and universities in Nevada: ==Public== === University and Community College System of Nevada === College City Website Great Basin College Elko http://www.gbcnv.edu/ Nevada State College Henderson http://www.nsc.edu Truckee Meadows Community College Reno http://www.tmcc.edu/ University of Nevada, Las Vegas Las Vegas https://www.unlv.edu/ University of Nevada, Reno Reno http://www.unr.edu/ Community College of Southern Nevada Henderson http://www.csn.edu ==Private== College City Campus Sierra Nevada College Example Example Touro University Nevada Example Example University of Southern Nevada Example Example ==References== * * CSN | * University of Nevada, Reno * Truckee Meadows Community College * Great Basin College: Home * Home - Nevada State College * University of Nevada, Las Vegas Category:Lists of colleges and universities Category:Nevada-related lists
title: Colleges and universities in Nevada
